pages.text: In the long exploration of the method of longevity, very few people have accidentally found that absorbing and refining spiritual can not only prolong life, but also enhance the ability to perceive the external environment. Later, people referred to such creatures that use spiritual as spiritual cultivator.

However, overworld is an area with a low concentration of spiritual, where the vast majority of human beings know spiritual in the form of experience orb, and they are used to using spiritual in a way with the characteristics of overworld. But this way of guiding spiritual conflicts with the way of spiritual cultivator, so cultivator cannot use anything possessed by enchantment.

Apart from humans being able to utilize spiritual, many creatures were also able to sense spiritual. Most of the creatures gained greater strength after absorbing spiritual, and those who had not shed their beast nature were called monster.
